column1: <p></p><p> By Mark Ledsom</p><p> BASEL (Reuters) - Britain's world number four Tim Henmanwon his opening match at the Swiss Indoors tennis tournamentwith little difficulty on Wednesday, beating Frenchman AntonyDupuis 6-3, 6-4.</p>
column2: <p></p><p> by mark ledsom</p><p> basel (reuters) - britain's world number four tim henmanwon his opening match at the swiss indoors tennis tournamentwith little difficulty on wednesday, beating frenchman antonydupuis 6-3, 6-4.</p>
